input_args.passage: 'Mitchell, Elizabeth | Maine | “Libby” Mitchell was born in South Carolina, but her hometown is Vassalboro. She attended Furman University for her B.A.; University of North Carolina at Chapel ...'
input_args.claim: 'According to source, she represented the 24th State Senate District from 2004 to 2010 and held the positions of Speaker of the Maine House of Representatives and President of the Maine Senate (2008–2010).'
